column1: and he finds swing right away! Back of a length and darts back in, finishes on leg, cramps Warner for room. Blocked off the back foot
full and swinging into the pads, Warner can't quite connect with a flick. He wears it on the pad
on a length and veering down leg, Bhuvneshwar is getting swing but the direction is wrong. Leg-side wide

shortish and wide outside off, Warner walks out. Bhuvneshwar dragged his length back seeing Warner shimmy out. The batsman reaches out and slices it in the air, to the right of a diving backward point
full, straight, accurate. Played back to the bowler off the front foot
gentle outswinger, starts outside off and moves away, no shot

Bhuvneshwar shifts wide of the crease, gets it to angle in at off stump, Finch presses forward and drives it to the left of short midwicket. The fielder throws himself to his left, takes some pace off the ball. He winds up deflecting it to mid-on
very full and angling in on middle, swings in, tickled away to long leg off an inside edge
just short of a good length and angling away outside off, Warner stands up tall and crisply punches it straight to extra cover
very full and slung very wide outside off, so much so it's past the guideline
full again, this is really close to off. Pitches on off and slants away outside off, floats through to the keeper after beating the outside edge
tighter on off, on a length, Warner presses forward and blocks it back to Bumrah
pitched up on off and off, Warner presses forward and push-drives a single to mid-off. Warner and Finch take on Kuldeep's arm and fetch a single
on a length and largely holds its line on a fifth-stump line, Finch opens his face and gently runs the ball to point
very full and ducks back in on middle, Warner eyes up the leg side but ends up poking the ball to the covers off an edge
Bhuvneshwar pulls his length back and gets it to angle away outside off, goes past the outside edge and creeps through to the keeper
really full and straight, 138ks, Warner shuffles forward and across as he defensively pushes the ball down to mid-on
full and angling in on middle, draws Warner forward. Driven to the right of Bhuvneshwar
on a length and holds its line outside off, Warner meets the ball with an open face and directs it down to deep third man
back of a length and outside off, Finch jabs with an open face to backward point
back of a length and slanted in on off, the result is a drop-and-run single to the covers
short and wide outside off, Finch throws his bat at the ball, slashes and misses
first boundary for Australia via a fortunate outside edge. Nice and full, angling in, then curls away. Finch is opened up, the edge falls on the ground and streaks away to the right of wide slip
back of a length and sliding outside leg, kisses the thigh pad on its way to Dhoni
just short of a good length and a hint of width outside off, Finch is at his best when he stands tall and hits through the line. Crisply punched in the gap at cover
back of a length and slanted down leg, past the glance, another leg-side wide
slower offcutter, 124ks, finishes on off, Finch spots the change-up and defends watchfully
Bhuvneshwar comes in from around the wicket and floats one into the pads of Warner, shovelled away with the bottom hand past the right of deep square leg
full and outside off, angling in, swinging in, foiling Warner's attempt to drive. He presses forward and only ekes out an inside edge onto the pad
on a length and outside off, Warner deploys a bigger stride and punches it on the up to backward point
picks off the pads and flicked straight to midwicket
Bhuvneshwar errs in line again, sliding into the leg stump, picked off the pads and glanced very fine to the boundary - the first for Warner
back of a length and slanted in on middle, Warner presses forward and pats it to cover-point
back of a length on a fifth-stump line, Finch moves forward and punchily drives it to short cover
on a length and on a fourth-stump line, Finch gets on top of it and defends to the off side
107ks slower ball wide outside off, Finch reaches out with his hands and stabs the offcutter to the left of backward point
back of a length, angled in, and seams away outside off. Finch hangs his bat out and watches the ball skim past the outside edge in the channel. The ball dies on its way to Dhoni
similar length on middle, Finch stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
tucked off the hips to deep square leg for a single
really full, angling in, creeps through, Finch defends this knee-high ball to short mid-on
length ball, slanted in on off, played back down the pitch
back of a length and on top of off, punched out to cover
back of a length and outside off, Finch attempts to hit on the up, through the covers, but a bit of away movement means he can't time it well. Sliced off the outside edge in the gap at backward point
skidding into the pads, deflected square through the leg side
Finch grunts as he meets this length ball outside off a bit too early. The ball isn't coming onto the bat. He attempts a drive ends up miscuing it to mid-off
wide of the crease, dug in short and outside off, Warner punches it wide of Kohli at short cover and pinch a quick single. A direct hit from Kohli at the non-striker's end could have had Warner
back of a length and straighter in line, turned to short midwicket
flicked off the pads square of short fine leg
pretty full and swerving in on off, seems like a slower offcutter, Finch aims to hit down the ground or possibly over midwicket. He ends up playing early and scooping the ball over short fine leg
dragged short and wide outside off, chopped away to the right of deep third man
on a length and outside off, 141ks, Warner allows the ball to come onto the bat, then glides to deep third man
fine leg is inside the circle and Bhuvneshwar strays on the pads. Warner laps up the gift and flicks it past Kuldeep at short fine leg
shot! A bit too full and outside off, Warner leans into a drive and crunches it to the left of short cover and to the right of mid-off. Gorgeous timing. Australia have got a move on
Warner yells 'wait on' as he meets this back-of-a-length ball on the back foot and dabs to backward point
full and angling in on off, patted to the covers
back of a length on middle, Warner hangs back and turns the ball to midwicket
full on off, opens the face and guides the ball to cover-point
short and outside off, not much room to free the arms. Finch stands up tall and punches through the line to mid-off
on a length and angling in on off and middle, Finch twirls it to the right of short midwicket, tests his calf out again, and gets a double
just short of a good length and outside off, Finch is early into a drive on this two-paced track. Toe-ends the ball to the covers
full and straight, flicked straight to short midwicket
back of a length and outside off, more width, and Finch punches it on the up to the cover-point sweeper
really full and outside off, Warner jabs it to cover, they take on Kohli's arm again. He has a dart at the non-striker's end but ends up conceding two overthrows

Warner takes on Kohli again. This time he swoops down on the ball at short midwicket and throws the stumps down at the keeper's end. But Finch is in. Pushed through on middle, the ball slides on straight, bunted in front of short midwicket for a hasty single
darted in on middle, Finch blocks back off the back foot
tossed up on off, Finch is early into a drive and ends up skewing an inside edge onto the pad
skidding outside leg, full but Finch prefers to play back. Grazes the pad and trickles away square on the leg side
pushed through on off, Warner covers the line and defends
turn for Chahal with the new-ish ball. Quicker legbreak, spins back in and cramps Warner for room. Jabbed towards short midwicket
short on middle, 128ks, Warner rises with the ball and fends it out to point
back of a length on middle, Warner backs away outside leg, looks to manufacture swinging room, and punches to backward point
back-of-a-length slower ball outside off, Warner waits for the ball to arrive, then stabs this offcutter to the off-side sweeper
137ks short ball on middle, Finch drops it in front of midwicket and hustles for a single. No discomfort
wide of the crease, short, angled in on off, sits up, Warner checks his punch and secures a single to mid-off
another slower offcutter outside off, Finch reads the change-up, opens the face and deflects the ball to backward point
Chahal tosses it up just outside off, Warner shapes for a reverse-sweep but does not make contact
really full and outside off, Warner drives through the gap at cover for two
Slammed flat and hard straight of long-on for a six! Tossed outside off, Warner presses forward and lifts it, just clearing the boundary
faster and flatter on the leg stump, clipped past midwicket
full and straight, Finch cracks it down to long-on
flighted on a fourth-stump line, Warner presses forward and drives a single to long-off
just short of a good length and outside off, Warner stands tall and punches it to the right of mid-off, where Jadhav dives over the ball. The ball skims away to the boundary
back of a length and slanted in on middle, played back to the bowler

Pandya's quick offcutter provides India with the breakthrough! Back of a length, skids in, then swerves away. A crease-bound Warner aims to punch it away through the covers, playing for the angle. Pandya beats the outside edge and hits the top of middle
wide of the crease, angling in on off, Smith shuffles across and works to midwicket
on a length on middle, pushed back to the bowler

pretty full on off - perfectly blameless delivery - but Smith shuffles across off, brings his wrists into play, and flicks it away. Deep midwicket dishes out a dive but can't stop the ball from rolling to the boundary
skidding on outside off, too close to Finch for a cut. Beaten
nudged to square leg
tossed outside off, driven to cover
slower through the air, starts on middle and breaks away, defended to cover
straight ball on middle, played back to the bowler
pushed through full and outside off, driven down to long-off
wide of the crease, but holds its line outside off, opens the face and taps to backward point
back of a length and straighter in line, tucked away to the right of midwicket
Pandya shifts wide of the crease, 131ks offcutter finishes outside off, beats the outside edge
slower offcutter wide outside off, Finch spots the change-up and drives it to the cover-point sweeper
pitched up and outside off, Smith presses forward and delightfully drives through the line to mid-off
good length and angling in at off stump, Finch covers up in defence, and that's drinks
tossed up and drifts in on off, eased down to long-on
looped up on middle, hit to short fine leg off an inside edge
liberally tossed up outside off, breaks in, Finch sizes up the flight of the googly and launches it straight of long-on for a six
pushed through full and straight, defended back to the bowler
quicker googly, skids back into leg stump, Finch plays back and defends it back
really, really full on the leg stump, jabbed down to long-on
wide of the crease, cutter, finishes on off, defended back to the bowler
Pandya slings a wide full-toss outside off, Finch extends his hands as far as he could and ends up toe-ending it back to the bowler instead of whooping it out of the ground
on a length and outside off, stabbed into the covers
full and just a shade outside off, calmly pushed down to long-on
Pandya ventures wide of the crease and angles it into the hips of Finch, clipped away to deep midwicket
wide of the crease, slower cutter, starts outside off and swerves in. Smith is too early into a cover drive and ends up squirting it back to the bowler. Pandya doing an excellent job for India
flatter and skids back in, Finch does not pick the googly. Plays back and ekes out an inside edge onto the pad
drifting into the pads again, glanced to short fine leg
short legbreak outside off, cut away to the cover-point sweeper
tossed up on middle, Finch twinkles down the track and drives it past the right of short midwicket. Great timing and placement to boot
Smith uses his feet again and hits it back to the bowler, who takes some pace off the ball
loopier and slower on off, Smith inches forward in defence
back of a length and on top of off, Finch stands tall and punches back to Pandya
Pandya ventures wide of the crease again. Gets this back-of-a-length ball to hold its line outside off. Finch thrusts his hands at the ball and sends a thick edge through where slip may have been
on a length and outside off, pushed to mid-off for a hasty single. Bumrah effects a direct hit at the bowler's end but Finch is safe
looks like a fast offcutter outside off, Pandya has Smith reaching out for it and goes past the outside edge
back of a length and outside off, opens the face and glides it down to third man

on a length and outside off, Finch presses forward, gets on top of the ball, punches to short cover, and tests his calf again. Pandey tumbled to his right to stop the ball but could not throw the stumps down. A direct hit could have dismissed Finch
sliding into the pads, glanced fine of short fine leg. Bumrah chases the ball but only comes second in the race
slower legbreak, poked to the covers
that's dismissive. Floated up on middle, Finch clears his front leg and tonks it down the ground for a one-bounce four. Finch celebrates his return with a 61-ball fifty
length ball on middle, defended
skidding into leg stump, blocked
loopier on off and breaks away, played to cover
full and outside off, clipped away to deep midwicket
floated up on middle and breaks down leg, Finch goes low and bottom-edges a sweep; he nutmegs Dhoni behind the stumps
pushed through on middle, deflected square on the leg side for one
tossed up and spins in, inside edged to midwicket
Smith shuffles across off and works this shorter, flatter ball to square leg
dragged shorter and outside off, punched through the line to long-off
on a length and skids on outside off, opens the face and dabs the ball to point
nice and full outside off, driven back to the bowler
full and straight, a whirl of the wrists sends the ball away to the square-leg boundary. Smith shuffled across and beat the man in the deep to his right
slower offcutter outside off, stabbed to backward point
wide of the crease, slammed in at the top of off, jabbed to point
overpitched and outside off, Finch lays into it, drilling a drive through the covers. The man in the deep is too square to cut it off
worked with the break to long leg
very full and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
lobbed up on the leg stump, poked to the covers off a leading edge
sliding into the pads, glanced to short fine leg
full and on a fourth-stump line, Smith responds with a wristy drive to long-off
a flat dart on middle, which is driven down to long-on
just short of a good length and outside off, cut away to the left of sweeper cover
back of a length on off, opens the face and runs the ball to point
wide of the crease, slower ball, finishes on off. Possibly an offcutter. Finch plays early and skews it down the ground
really full and wide outside off, Smith reaches out for the ball drives it regally to the cover-point sweeper
good-length offcutter, driven to midwicket
just short of a good length and outside off, chopped down to third man
good length outside off, carved to backward point
on a length, seaming back in, honing in on off. The perfect length to Finch, pushed back to the bowler
that's a tad short, and straight. Helped along down to fine leg with the angle.
nice lengths from Bumrah, slightly back of a length outside off, a typical Smith jab into the cover point region
the first full delivery of the over, outside off, driven languidly to mid-off
135 kph, full outside off, blocked to cover.
full outside off, Smith opens his bat face and guides it to the sweeper cover. Just looking for some control here are India
nicely bowled, a slower ball outside off, blocked to cover. The knuckle ball actually
goes wide of the crease, comes back in, Finch sees width but it isn't really wide enough to cut. Beaten on his cut
the slower ball again and far too full, Finch picks the variation, gets underneath the length and extends his drive, that's all really. Fantastic timing, short boundaries, six anyday
punched this time to long-on
short and wide, slashed to the deep point fielder
fantastic placement. Great stop from Pandya too. Flat down leg, Smith paddles him hard down towards fine leg. Pandya runs around from wide fine leg, and pulls the ball back in to save a run
the googly, can pick it from the line, started that well down leg, off the outside edge to Jadeja at backward point
quick down leg, nudged down to fine leg. 'Bahut badiya,' says Dhoni (very good)
wristspin and bounce. Flat down leg, Finch looks for the sweep, but gets a thick leading edge which lobs over Chahal at short fine leg
on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
and the googly again, can pick it from the line, starts it down leg. Finch watchfully defends. Seven riskless runs
flat outside off, blocked towards point for one
drifts on the pads, nudged to short fine leg
short and wide, not bowling full intentionally. Slapped to Kohli at cover, who dives to his left, much to the crowd's delight
quick and straight, skewed to midwicket. Still nothing full
he probably anticipated that. Short outside off, Finch sat back and slapped a pull just wide of midwicket. Good batting
stays back again, predictable. Straight and flat, punched to long-off
a full googly that is picked easily and driven to long-off for one
excellent single from Finch. Called Smith through right away. A googly outside off, carved towards backward point
the googly on off and middle, defended
the stock ball, flat around off, pushed away towards point

just clears long-off. Would have been gobbled up at the Gabba, but not here. The googly outside off, Finch picks the variation, tries to go over cover but gets it straighter. Bumrah at long-off just watches it go over him
flat and wide outside off and boooom! Straight past Smith. Down the ground. Long-off has no chance. Sublime hitting. His muscle has got him 10 runs in two balls

just beautiful batting. Negating wristspin with so much ease. Runs at the bowler, meets the ball as it pitches and flicks the ball - against the spin - over midwicket. How easy did he make a tough shot look?
flat outside off, defended into the cover
lots of loop around middle and leg, driven to long-on
short and wide outside off, slapped to the sweeper cover
shortish outside off, punched to the deep point fielder for a run
overpitched and straight, driven to long-off. Milking these spinners, setting up a 90-run last 10?
too full from Kuldeep outside off, driven to long-on
excessively full on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket
the googly, again it's the line and Finch picks it, started that down leg. Finch gets low and paddles his hard sweep to deep backward square leg
flat down leg, Smith looks for a hard sweep again but misses. Dhoni does well to stop byes
overpitched outside off, driven to long-off
the googly down leg, kept out
full around off, defended to cover, where Kohli picks up and throws at the bowler's end, the back-up can't get there in time and concedes the overthrow. Unnecessary
a slower cutter outside off, the ball goes underneath Finch's lazy drive. Fatigue maybe?
good length, around off, pushed back to the bowler. Using the variations nicely here is Pandya.
good length around off, flicked to midwicket from the crease
good length outside off, sliced behind point for a couple. The backward point fielder should have done better, just escorted it to the deep fielder. No dive
good stop from Pandya. A three-run over, India will take that. A slower ball outside off, driven back where Pandya dives to his right and saves a run
flat on the pads, flicked down to fine leg again for one
a hundred for Finch in his first game back. Sensational batting. The googly down leg, sweeps this hard behind square, keeps it along the ground. A fistpump, not much more
flat and straight, defended back
the topspinner, full and flighted outside off, Finch gets low and goes weeeeee, right in his wheelhouse and the sweep goes welll over long-on.
flatter this time, Finch goes back and defends
fuller and quicker outside off, driven back to the bowler. I'm definitely jumping the gun but a double-hundred is not out the question
a full slow ball outside off, driven to long-on with ease
good length on middle and leg, nudged behind square for a couple. Sensational batting from Finch. India under pressure. 200 up
good length around off, clipped to midwicket
smashed! Shortish on middle, sits up for Finch and he gives it a good thwack through midwicket. Disdain, out of my face Hardik.
drifts down leg, wide called
good length outside off, sliced away to backward point
strays down leg again, does not want to offer width
a good slower ball to finish, clipped to midwicket
flat down leg, another wide. Dhoni collects and whips the bails off in a flash
overpitched flight on off, flicked to long-on
quick on the pads, worked away to deep square leg
runs down at the bowler and clips the stock ball to square leg
ooh, short and straight, Smith goes back and punches to cover. Won't be happy with that result
drifting down leg, a tickle on that from Smith to fine leg
a mis-timed six. Wanted to go over long-on or midwicket but the ball turns, takes the outside half and travels straight over the bowler for six. Just clears the boundary too
good length around off, Smith misses a run after failing to connect with a flick
full outside off, 133 kph, driven to the sweeper cover
good length, a slower delivery, 130 kph, off the body towards gully for a run. Hit the inside edge
full delivery outside off, driven towards wide mid-off. Chahal cuts it off
short and wide outside off, scythed through to deep point for another run
132 kph, inside edge onto the pad to square leg. Smith brings up his fifty too
shimmies down and works the ball to midwicket
flatter trajectory, straight and quick, pushed back to the bowler
shorter, straighter, nudged away to deep midwicket
short on off, Finch stays back and pummels a pull wide of long-on. Rahane gets across and stops the boundary

taken at deep midwicket. Finch's belligerence ends. It's full and Finch sees an opportunity to hit it over midwicket, but Finch can't get underneath the length, which means his heave goes straight and flat to Jadhav at deep midwicket, who takes it awkwardly. A white towel falls off, and Finch thinks it's the ball. But has to walk off. Fine innings from Finch, has put Australia in command
the googly down leg, worked away to midwicket
good length outside off, pushed to cover from the back foot
on the pads, flicked away to deep backward square leg for a comfortable brace
fullish delivery outside off, driven to the sweeper cover
132 kph, short and straight, it's not short enough, doesn't get up much either. Maxwell wants to ramp it over third man, but is hit on the glove. Awkwardly played
good length outside off, punched to the sweeper cover
a thick outside edge for four. A slower ball outside off, Smith plays the line, but the ball takes the outside edge and races away past short third man
full and wide outside off to start from Bumrah, guided to backward point
good length outside off, carved down to third man
a slower ball outside off, worked to midwicket for a run, 114 kph
looking for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss, sliced to backward point
whipped away to mid-on, 135 kph
a low full toss on middle is worked away to midwicket. Good from Bumrah
quick outside off, turning away, 87 kph, pushed back
shortish outside off, spins away and Smith's intended pull to midwicket goes to square leg instead
a slow delivery outside off, plenty of flight, slapped to long-off. Didn't make the mistake of trying to go over long-on like Chennai
quick and flat, nudged to midwicket
sees Smith coming and fires this wide outside off. Smith is good enough to defend
terrific over, just two from it. Flight outside off, driven away to cover. Losing some momentum
flat and wide outside off, that line is very intentional, slapped to cover
the googly, bowled it wide outside off, powered to long-on. Don't think he read that
a googly outside off, sees Smith coming and bowls it wide. Smith can still cut through point for a couple. Excellent cricket
shortish and wide, hit to the sweeper cover from the back foot
the slow googly outside off is too wide and is called
the seam-up delivery, took everyone by surprise but it's down leg. 90 kmph.
flat and short outside off, muscled to long-on. Not getting the elevation he wants

easily taken at long-off. It's the googly outside off, Smith wanted to get closer to the ball and hit it straighter but the ball skews off the outside half and lobs to Bumrah at long-off. Looking into the sun is Bumrah, but he has his sunglasses on. Kuldeep has been a touch expensive, but has got two big wickets when they're trying to go after him.

Maxwell gone now. Two in two for India. Australia losing their way. He shuffled right across, looking to go straight. He came running down but Chahal fires this wide outside off, so wide that Maxwell can't even get close to it. Misses it by a distance and Dhoni's hands are far too quick for Maxwell to consider going back. Chahal has him thrice in this series now, all while Maxwell has tried to take him down. Fantastic defensive bowling from India's spinners
quick on the pads, nudged to midwicket. Vital dot balls at this time of the innings
shortish outside off, turning away, cut to the deep point fielder
flat outside off, driven to mid-off for a run. The fielder hits the stumps at the bowler's end
quick and straight, flat, pushed back
short and wide outside off, left alone from Stoinis, wanted a wide. Umpire doesn't think so
lots of flight outside off, well outside his hitting arc, driven to long-off for one
enough muscle behind that to clear long-off. A googly outside off, Stoinis got underneath it and swung cleanly over long-off. He may have read that well
slow outside off, pushed in front of cover for a run.
the googly outside off, Head goes back and punches to point
75 kph, lots of flight outside off, punched to long-off
the googly on off, worked to square leg for one
a full drifty delivery outside off, may have been the knuckle ball, 124 kph, cut to point

shuffled right across, full on off, hit away to midwicket via the pad. It's pad and then bat. Kohli wants to review, not a bad time to do so. Definitely pad first, but impact is just outside the line. So good call from the umpire Shamshuddin
a slower wide delivery outside off, chopped to backward point
excellent yorker, bang on target. Outside off. Jammed out
a wide knuckle ball outside off, well outside the tramline too, wide called
another fine yorker outside off, jammed away to cover
a slow wide delivery outside off, driven to long-off for one. Just four off the over
good length on off, Stoinis can only keep it out. Fine bowling this
skiddy, 132 kph, full around leg, beats Stoinis' inside edge and hits him on the back leg

goes straight through , 119 kph, it's a slower ball on middle and leg, the offcutter. Head plays with an angled bat, trying to find midwicket, but that means the ball has enough room to go through his flick and hit the stumps. Middle stump is uprooted. Australia losing their way
shuffles right across and flicks down to fine leg for one
on a length around off, inside-edged towards midwicket for one. A tight, but easy run
strays down leg for a wide
137 kph, full around off, driven to mid-off where Pandey is quick on the ball. Stoinis is sent back in time
full and too wide outside off, called. A few too many extras here
full and wide, sliced to deep point. Keeping the ball out of the hitting arc
well out with a direct hit. A good length delivery is patted to Chahal at cover. Stoinis set off late, Handscomb called for one as soon as he hit it. Chahal misses at the batsman's end
another short wide delivery that is too wide for legality
what power from Stoinis. Bhuvneshwar goes straight this time, full around off, drilled past Bhuvi's feet. Long-off didn't have a long way to go but did not have a chance
a low full toss outside off is smashed to the deep cover for one
a full slow delivery outside off, Handscomb stays in his crease, trying to go over long-on but no connection
another big hoick that Handscomb misses. Full outside off, no bat.
a slower ball outside off, Stoinis can't get bat on ball. It's another cutter. Stoinis' strike rate now dips below 100

good length outside off, pushed to the sweeper cover. Stoinis thinks of two, but Rahane is quick on it. Great bowling, the lengths are so intentionally all over the place that the batsmen can't line 'em up
a wide slower delivery outside off, worked away to deep square leg. Just one more
fuller than good length around off, punched down to long-off. Another single more

sensational catching from Pandey. A slower delivery outside off is hit nicely to long-off, it looks like six for the entirety of its trajectory until Pandey gets around to his right, takes a reverse-cupped catch, realises he was stepping over the boundary and threw it back up in the air. Then, he nonchalantly got back in and took the catch, no fuss, no trouble.
on the pads, and off it for a run to fine leg. Just four off the over
full and wide outside off, sliced to deep point. Excellent defensive bowling
full and straight, that's Agar's job, bat on ball to long-on for one
extremely full outside off, Stoinis is sitting back in the crease but still can't get enough on his drive. To long-off for one
120 kph, a wide slower ball outside off, Agar chips a drive to the sweeper cover. Falls well in front
smashed away, but the field is well set and Bhuvneshwar is bowling to his field. Full and wide, hammered to deep cover for one.
a good wide delivery outside off, inside the tramline.
Stoinis backs away and Bumrah follows him, good length on leg, defended back. Can't do much more. Sensational bowling
the wide slower delivery that is too wide. Called a wide
gets inside the line this time, trying to help it down to fine leg but it drifts down leg for a wide.
good length outside off, carved away to the sweeper cover for one more. Superb stuff this
a low full toss on middle and leg, whipped to wide long-on where Pandey cuts off the boundary. Two more
that's poor line. A slow delivery down leg, clipped away over short fine leg for four. Not the right line
full and wide outside off, drilled away to deep cover for a run. Executed well there
good length around off, shovelled past square leg for a couple.
back of a length and swerves in on off, 144ks, Rahane blocks it beside his feet
on a length and swings away outside off, 142ks, Rahane uses the pace of Cummins to his advance; opens the face and dabs it wide of backward point
much fuller on a fifth-stump line, 142ks, Rohit is right forward to middle a forward defensive to cover
just short of a good length and angling in on middle, Rohit sits back and blocks to the leg side
good length and slanted in on off, 146s - pace like fire - Rohit presses forward and blocks it back to Cummins
short and outside off, 143ks, beats Rohit for pace and does not bounce as much as the batsman expected it to. He stabs at the ball in the channel and nearly drags it back onto the stumps
nice and full on off, he finds movement off the surface, takes the outside edge and runs down to third man
pitched up on off, Rahane nurdles it through the gap at midwicket
tight line on off, Rohit is tight in his defence as well
shorter and just a shade outside off, 141ks, punched on the up to short cover
very full and veering down leg, beats the glance, beats the keeper too
wide of the crease, Coulter-Nile hammers one into the middle of the deck. Rahane swivels on the back foot and smartly pulls this chest-hunting ball to deep square leg
on a length on a fifth-sixth stump line outside off, no shot
back of a length and angled in on off, 144ks, blocked back down the pitch off the back foot

back of a length and outside off, Rahane punches sweetly but can't get the ball past cover-point. The throw is wild from Smith, to the right of Stonis at mid-off. Stoinis can't can't collect is on the half-volley. The umpires deem is a dead ball. Not sure why
stands tall and punches through the line to the covers
back of a length and angled in, squeezed off the inside half to the leg side
variable bounce! On a length and zipping through outside off, beats Rahane's cut, and skids under the bat to Handscomb
very full and angling into the pads, flicked away through square leg
back of a length and slanted in, tucks 'em up for room, worked away to short midwicket
wide of the crease but the quick gets it to hold its line just a shade outside off, Rahane simply taps the ball to cover
Rahane dashes down the track, manufactures a half-volley and drives it inside out over extra cover. The cross-seam delivery is dispatched to the boundary
Rahane rides the bounce of this short delivery outside off and dabs it to third man
short and just outside off, cramps Rohit for room. He chops it behind point and sets off for a single. Good response from Rahane
skidding into the thigh, 142ks, Rahane misses the flick, as the ball kisses the pad and rolls to leg
short on top of off, punchily defended to mid-on off the back foot
Rahane picks it from off stump and twirls it away through midwicket. Lovely wristwork

145ks bouncer outside off, Rohit picks the length early. Rocks back and crunnnnnches a pull over long leg. Sends the ball to the second tier. Whoa, what a shot!. He had scooped a similar rapid ball from Chameera for a six in Sri Lanka
back of a length on off, 146ks, quietly defended to point
back of a length and angled in on middle, 144ks, pushed back to Cummins
picked off the pads to fine leg
full on middle, pushed down to mid-on
a bit too full and straying into the pads, Rohit unfurls a vintage drive, sends it rolling through midwicket with a straight bat
on a length and outside off, jabbed to the covers
wide of the crease, short, angled in on middle, punched down to long-on
Rohit launches this over long-off for a six. Pitched up and outside off - right in his swinging arc - he nonchalantly lifts it over the boundary
back of a length and outside off, Rohit rides it down to third man
back of a length and attached with plenty of width outside off, Rohit creams it straight to backward point

Maxwell dives full-length to his left at backward point but can't cling onto this half-chance. 147ks, short and wide outside off, Rohit scythes it away in the air and gets away. Too harsh to term it a drop
pitched up and outside off, Rohit unfurls another drive from the top draw but can't get it past mid-off
just short of a good length and angled in, blocked to leg off the back foot
hip-high short ball outside off, Rohit swivels and short-arm pulls it over square leg. Terrific batting from Rohit and the Indore crowd goes: 'Rohit!Rohit!Rohit!'
shortish and outside off, guided to backward point
shovelled away wide of midwicket
length-ball offcutter on off, Rohit sits back and works it square on the leg side
back of a length on off, Rahane stands tall and punches it back down the pitch
slower ball outside off, offcutter sticks in the surface and bounces, Rahane opens the face and quells it to point
pitched up and outside off, Rahane leans into a drive, opens the face and strokes it to cover
just short of a good length and outside off, Rahane crashes a cut to the left of the cover-point sweeper. Agar makes a mess and fumbles, but the batsman is kept to two
good length on off, forward and played back to the bowler
back of a length just a shade outside off, punched to cover

Rohit launches it outta the ground! Fetch that, Richardson. He races down the track, the bowler drags it short on the leg stump. Picks it off the hips and pulls it nonchalantly, sending the white ball flying out of the ground. Grand...
slower full ball on middle, patted down to long-on
shorter on off, turns it to the right of midwicket and hands over the strike to Rohit
cross-seamer outside off, kicks up, Rohit rises with it and dabs to short third man
back of a length offcutter, guided to short fine leg off the hips
Rahane forays down the track, manufactures his own length - half-volley - and hoicks it across the line to the right of a diving short midwicket. Not pretty but effective
very full and scoots through outside off, more evidence of variable bounce as this offcutter grazes the edge but it falls well short of Handscomb
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, tripe bowling, Rahane whips it square of short fine leg
dug in short and wide outside off - third man is up - Rahane rides the bounce, rolls his wrists, and dabs it past the right of the man in the circle
pitched up and just a shade outside off, driven crisply but straight to the bowler
slides on outside off, Rohit hits it through point, calls for two. Takes on Coulter-Nile's arm and gets it
short and skidding in on off, 96ks, hangs back and punches a single down to long-on
slides in at off stump again, Rahane brings his wrists into play, and works it through square leg
straight ball on off Rohit blocks it back to the bowler
short dart outside off, Rohit punches through the line to long-off
full and straight, milked square of short fine leg
full and skids through under lights. Rahane reaches out for the ball in the channel and is beaten past the outside edge
back of a length on  off, clipped away to long leg
pitched up and outside off, slices a drive to backward point
just short of a good length on middle, Rohit stands tall and punches the ball to mid-on
pitched up and outside off, Rohit flows forward and middles a drive to sweeper
hip-high short ball outside off, Rahane swivels and pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket
tossed on off, opens the face and taps it to cover
skids on outside off, 96ks, presses forward and pushes the ball to the same fielder
angling in on off, clipped with the angle through square leg
looped up on leg stump, Rohit stays leg-side of the ball and strokes it back to Agar
darted in on middle, punched off the back foot to the left of Agar

Rohit is making batting look ridiculously easy in Indore. He raises a fifty off 42 balls. Agar, for a change tosses it up on middle stump, Rohit hoists it straight down the ground for another six. Lovely flow of the arms
Rahane stands up tall to this shortish ball outside off and beautifully punches through the line to the right of sweeper
dragged short and wide - wider than a set of stumps outside off - Rahane reaches out for the ball and carves a cut to sweeper
slower cutter outside off, Rohit plays early and swishes it to the cover-point sweeper
short and outside off, the ball is coming on nicely under lights, Rahane pulls it hard to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, this ball stops on Rohit who checks his punch and strokes it to mid-off
pitched up on middle, eased down the ground to long-on
skids on outside off, keeps low, Rohit chops it away square through the off side. Coulter-Nile runs across from sweeper cover, dives, and bangs his head against the turf. Ouch! He grimaces in pain
pushed through on middle, bunted to midwicket off the back foot
straight ball on middle, Rohit presses forward and secures a single down to long-off
tossed on off, forward defensive
thigh-high short ball on off stump, Rahane picks the length early and thrashes a pull to the right of a diving Glenn Maxwell at short midwicket
Rahane brings up the century stand with a wristy whip to deep square leg off the back foot
on a length and on middle, pushed down to mid-on
Rahane walks out, meets a length ball on off and clips it away to deep square leg
full and straight, Rohit plays with a straight bat and drives to deep midwicket
offcutter, short and that's punches straight of mid-on
thigh-high short ball outside off, it does not get up, Rahane adjusts to the bounce or the lack of it and flays a pull to the long leg boundary. India coasting along
slower ball outside off, full, dinked to point off an open face
length ball on off, nearly 148ks, played back to Cummins
whoa! Grand. Pitched up and outside off, Rohit plants his front foot and lofts it straight over the bowler's head

shorter and outside off, Rohit fetches a pull from there and expertly places it to the right of deep midwicket. Agar throws himself to his right at the edge of the boundary but the ball beats him. Agar is in discomfort and leaves the field
picked off the pads through midwicket
Rahane uses the pace of Cummins to his advantage and dabs this full one from outside off to third man

Handscomb, the part-time keeper, drops a low catch to his right. He reprieves Rohit on 67. Back of a length and outside off, Rohit aims to dab it down to third man. Instead, he nicks it fine enough. Handscomb dives to his right but can't cling onto the one-handed catch. Difficult chance as the ball was dying on him
pitched up on off, Rahane presses forward and smoothly drives the ball to mid-on
leg-side ball, Rahane simply glances it fine, and brings up a run-a-ball fifty
length ball on off, Rahane dinks it to backward point
full and outside off, Rahane eases a drive to sweeper on the off side
Rohit stands tall, punches a back-of-a-length ball from outside off to backward point
wide of the crease, slanted in on off, Rohit aims to run it down to third man. Instead, plays it squarer to backward point
full and outside off, patted to point
just short of a good length and outside off, Rahane rolls his wrists and controls a pull to Finch at deep square leg
too straight in line, picked off to deep midwicket now
Cummins runs to his left from deep midwicket and swats the ball back into the field of play. Excellent effort. Shortish and outside off, Rohit hammered a pull to cow corner
back of a length and outside off, does not bounce at all, Rohit slashes, and skews it back to the bowler
on a length on off, forward defensive
on a length and outside off, Rahane drives it on the up to mid-off
Rahane walks at the bowler, this is dug in shorter and outside off, diffused to cover
wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, lashed away to backward point
leg-side ball, deflected down to long leg
shortish and outside off, Rohit gets on top of the bounce and caresses it to sweeper cover
hip-high short ball on off stump, Rahane sizes up the length and stylishly swats it away to the right of deep square leg
short and skids on outside off, eased to sweeper cover off the back foot
length ball outside off, manipulated to short midwicket with the wrists
good length and outside off, clipped out to short midwicket again
shorter and outside off, Rahane is up on his tippy toes as he fends it back to the bowler
Rahane forays down the track, fetches a length ball from outside off and belts it to the left of mid-off
full and outside off, opens the face and guides it to the right of third man
Chipped past the outstretched left hand of Coulter-Nile, then beats mid-off to his right. On a length and outside off, Rahane checks his punch and hits it past the bowler
finally, the yorker makes an appearance. Right in the blockhole on off, squeezed to point
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, angled down to third man

dug in short on the off stump, Rohit shapes to pull but the bat twists on impact. He can only splice it off the top of the bat. The ball balloons to deep midwicket, where Hilton Cartwright, subbing for the injured Agar, pouches it. Coulter-Nile breaks the rollicking 139-run stand
full and straight, clipped away easily through square leg
Rohit shuffles across off, drives this full one from outside off to mid-off
pushed through flat and quick on middle and leg, hit down to long-on
slider outside off, pushed down the ground
straight ball on off, tapped down to long-off
slower through the air on middle stump, forward and pushed back to Agar
worked from off stump through square leg
fizzes through on middle and leg, Kohli is cramped for room as he chops to point
back of a length on off, Rahane calls for two as he deftly flicks it to long leg
short and zips through outside off, Rahane can't connect with a late cut

Cummins pins Rahane in front! On a length and skids into off stump, 141.8ks, Rahane, jumping off the ground, plays across the line and is smacked on the front pad. The umpire raises his finger. Rahane does not bother to review. Impact in line? The tracker returns umpires call on impact
really full and just outside off, driven to cover
back of a length on off, guided to backward point
length ball on middle, snakes away, snatches the outside edge and streaks away to third man
pushed through flat and too full on middle, Pandya smokes it over the wide long-on boundary. Not middled but such is the strength of Pandya
skidding on outside off, pushed to cover
100.8ks dart, pushed down to long-on
fired outside off, chopped to point
flat dart on the leg stump, bunted down the ground
full on middle, worked away to midwicket
142 kph, fullish outside off, guided towards backward point
full outside off, punched to the cover
full outside off, chipped to the extra cover fielder
that's close! Full on leg, Pandya misses a flick and is struck flush on the pad in front of leg. May have been sliding down. Too early through his shot, definitely going down
Pandya's bat doesn't seem to be coming down straight, it's coming down from backward point more than slip. That's why this full delivery has been skewed to deep point
no bat angle problems this time, on the pads, flicked away merrily through backward point for four. Easy as ...
under the length and boom! Just a tad full and straight, and Pandya gets underneath it, sends it soaring over long-on with ease. A smile from Kohli
flatter and wider outside off, punched to deep point
excellent running. Full and straight, on off, tapped towards point and sets off. Pandya has a positive response and they make a tough run look incredibly easy
flat on middle and leg, pushed to long-on, where Maxwell dives away to his left spectacularly to save a run. Sensational cricket
flat outside off, punched to long-off
that's cut from the stumps. Such control from Kohli. Flat on off, he goes back and scythes a cut to deep point.
full outside off, driven to cover
147 kph, generating impressive pace but the line is wayward. On Kohli's pads, who gleefully flicks down to fine leg
on the pads, Pandya whips it away Steven Smith style, but on the bounce to deep square leg. Cummins and Pandya have a chat, I don't think they're talking about dinner, or any other meal
on a length outside off, dabbed towards backward point
nice stop from Warner at mid-off. Full outside off, driven away past the bowler. Warner runs to his right, very hard to get past him
actually Kohli can. Too full from Cummins, overpitched outside off and Kohli leans on his drive and sends it between cover and mid-off. When Warner has no chance, not many do
a short offcutter sits up for Pandya to pull to deep midwicket
slightly full outside off, a thick outside edge to third man for one. So many times we've seen that
full on the pads, driven with a straight bat to long-on
128 kph, overpitched outside off, Kohli creams his cover drive to cover
a very short offcutter on middle and off, Kohli watchfully glides his jabbed pull to fine leg
128 kph, good length outside off, worked back to the bowler
full and straight, Kohli shuffles across and walks down but can't time his flick. Finds mid-on. He won't play the dab to third man unless it's too wide
138 kph, full outside off, driven sweetly to extra cover for a run. The fielder stopped that well considering the bobble right in front of him
on a length around middle and leg, worked to midwicket
width! Short and wide, cut straight to backward point who can't collect cleanly. Kohli steals the run
good length outside off, dabbed to midwicket. No run there
slower delivery outside off, guided to third man for one
on the pads again, don't know why they keep bowling there. Driven to mid-on for another easy single.
nicely played. A short offcutter, Stoinis cleverly bowls that length for the catch to deep square leg. Pandya brings his bat down from up, which means the ball will always go down. One to square leg
128 kph, tidy bowling from Stoinis, outside off, dabbed down to third man
shortish and straight, punched to long-on
whipped away to midwicket from the crease. That's just wrist power, a strong bottom hand
there's that length again. The short, slow offcutter outside off, Kohli under-edged his stabbed pull to the keeper. Good over from Stoinis
138 kph, excellent line, goes wide of the crease and bowls this full on off, seaming in. There are four inside the circle on the off side. Driven with a straight bat to mid-off. Bowling to a plan
full and straight, Pandya's bat angle again comes down at an unnatural angle, driven back
full and wide outside off this time, chopped to point
Smith saves three. Full and wide outside off, drilled to the right of Smith at cover who gets a hand on it
full outside off, seaming back in. Kohli stays back and skews a drive to midwicket. Another good over from NCN
wide enough for Kohli to open the bat face and guide this down to third man
driven languidly through cover for an easy couple. Full outside off from Stoinis, far too easy for Kohli
131 kph, on a length around off, clipped to midwicket. Kohli not happy with that result
another short, slow cutter on off, pulled to deep square leg, on the bounce
outside off, dabbed towards short third man. Richardson dives to his right to save three
on a length around off, pushed to mid-on
fullish outside off, nudged down to third man for another run. Where's the sweat?
nice legcutter from Richardson at 128 kph, Kohli forced into caution, defended
guided down to third man again. Just opening the bat face late
good length outside off, 139 kph, stabbed into the gap at extra cover for a run
full and wide outside off, punched to the sweeper cover
a short delivery around off, Pandya misses an upper ramp
chopped down to third man. Pandya wanted two, but Kohli sent him back
Agar bowls the first one short, not full like previous overs, respectfully driven to long-on
on the pads, flicked away to midwicket from the crease

eeks, he's picked out long-on has Virat Kohli. Very full from Agar outside off, Kohli sees the length and wants to go over cover, but the bat comes down straight, as opposed to from slightly leg side, which means the ball skews off the inside half and lobs to Finch at long-off. That's a rare mistake from Kohli, won't be happy with the dead ball either
flight on off, defended back
a wild slog from Jadhav, came racing down at Agar but swings from outside the line, gets a thick inside edge to fine leg for two
flat and wide, sliced to point

short and wide from Richardson, cut away to backward point. The fielder fumbled and Pandya wanted two, but Jadhav said no. I can think of a few batsmen who would have not been happy with that from Jadhav

got 'im. A poor shot. Short and wide outside off, coming back in, that ball is not nearly wide enough to cut, but Jadhav still goes through with the stroke. Gets a thick outside edge which Handsomb takes low in front of him.
136 kph, full outside off, defended to backward point
on a length on off, 135 kph, bunted back to the bowler
137 kph, no run to Warner there. Full outside off, driven to Warner at mid-off, who is game aware, and quick on the ball
full outside off, driven away to Warner again. No run. Just the one off the over and a wicket
slow and straight, defended back to the bowler
picks the length, stays back and wallops a flat-batted six over midwicket. Does in Agar in the mind, Agar forced into a short length, and Pandya was waiting on the back foot
winds up but Agar bowls this wide outside off, slapped to cover
in the gap again. Short on middle and leg, 99 kph, too quick. Pandya gleefully pulls over midwicket. Stands there and admires the shot. The arrogance.
90 kph, slower on off, driven to cover. Well bowled

dropped! A very tough catch for Smith, but they needed that. Flight outside off, Pandya wants to go straight but agar extracts some turn, the ball skews off the outside half and lobs towards a cover at the edge of the circle. Smith backtracks, gets underneath it and spills a hard chance.
worked away to deep midwicket this time.
tripe from Coulter-Nile, short down leg and Pandey gets off the mark with a whip through fine leg.
terrific power. 138 kph, full around off, Pandey smashes his drive back past the bowler. Mid-off and mid-on both are in. Not quite timed
full on leg, clipped to mid-on
eeks, that's a bad shot. Full and wide outside off, skewed to wide mid-on. Wanted to go over cover
good improvisation from Pandya. Wants to pull but the ball is not there to do so, so he defends it back. Something Jadhav did not do
full on leg, blocked to mid-on. Good captaincy from Smith to keep mid-on up
short and wide outside off, punched to deep point
six more! He's not bothered about the previous failure. Runs to the pitch and smashes it over long-on. Quick footwork. Proper power
gets to fifty. India's new allrounder gets an ovation. 100 kph outside off, worked to deep midwicket
91 kph, flat on leg, pushed to mid-on.
quick and straight, blocked back. Good batting from Pandey
132 kph, a good length delivery, moving back in, defended from the crease
driven to long-on, 141 kph. Had to wait for the ball to beat a diving midwicket
good length delivery outside off, slapped to midwicket, who dives to his left and parries to mid-on
on the pads and whipped away through backward square leg for another couple. Good result
129 kph, good length outside off, punched to cover from the crease
short on off, Pandya misses a pull, the ball creeps underneath and hits him in the midriff. Ouch. A leg bye, more a groin bye
flight outside off, driven to cover. Not the line he wants so he plays it out
overpitched outside off, driven to long-off
short and wide, under-edged to short third man for one
full and wide, a no-feet drive to cover.
slow on off, blocked to cover
quick outside off, Pandey goes back and defends. Agar's done for the night, bowled better than 1 for 71
good length outside off, dabbed towards cover, 136 kph. Well improvised again
141 kph, fullish length outside off, driven to cover
just wide of the stumps and that's four. Full and wide outside off, a thick inside edge somehow evades the stumps and races away down to fine leg. Terrific bowling, just enough lateral movement
nicely hit, good stop too. Full and straight, driven back to Cummins, who gets a boot on it in his follow through
dabbed wide of backward point. Finch had to run around that at third man
good length outside off, a tap to third man
fullish and straight, pushed to long-on with ease
128 kph, around off, driven to mid-on
a short cutter again, a thick leading edge lobs towards fine leg. Good stop from the fielder at fine leg. A couple more. A forehand slap
nudged to midwicket
gets the gap and on this outfield, it's four all night long. Full and wide, slapped through cover for four. Used the pace and deflected the ball where he wanted
short again, pulled to mid-on. Stoinis has a word with the batsman, who has nothing to say in return
full and straight, beautifully, delectably, elegantly on-driven through long-on. The timing is impeccable
good length on middle and leg, drags his length back, defended
deftly dabbed to third man for a run
good length outside off, carved away to the sweeper cover for one. Pandey doing his thing
a slower delivery on leg, 123 kph, worked down to fine leg
full and wide, sliced to third man.
over mid-on. Full around off, Pandey wanted to go straight over the bowler's head but the ball skews off the inside half, the bat handle turns in his hands but who cares?
that should be the game now. A short cutter again, far too predictable, sits up for Pandey to whack through midwicket. Too easy.
another short cutter on off and middle, think Mike and Bob Bryan's touch volley and think Pandey's touch forehand push to long-on. They aren't too much different. One to mid-on

what a shot. A short slow delivery on off, Pandey doesn't change the way the bat is moving, he just adjusts the bat to ensure the ball hits the bat, so that the ball doesn't go to third man. Instead, it goes right over the keeper. That is the perfect ramp shot
a tad short on middle and leg and Pandya muscles the pull through midwicket. Fantastic stroke-making
dabbed towards third man for a run
good length around off and middle, defended back
wild. Full outside off, Pandya has done anything he wants this innings, so he tries a no-look swing, but fails to connect.
good length on leg, follows Pandya, defended
good stop from Handscomb. Short down leg, gloved down to fine leg, where Handscomb dives to his lefgt and saves four. Applause from the bowler.
strays down leg for a wide. 140 kph
146 kph, full on leg. Pandya mis-times one. Clears his front leg, intends to go over mid-on but mis-times the ball right to mid-on. Fine knock from Pandya
on the pads, flicked through square leg for a run
full around off, driven to long-on. The crowd goes silent
83 kph, full and wide outside off, driven to mid-off
flat and straight, nudged down to fine leg
on the pads, worked to square leg.
whipped away to square leg again, nice and calm, soaking in the chants
driven away with the spin to midwicket. Two off the over, but not good enough for Australia
that's a boundary. Full and wide from Richardson, Pandey clears his front leg and nails his lofted drive over the bowler. Stunning timing and power
short of a length outside off, pulled to midwicket
a low full toss, whipped away to deep square leg. The crowd is happy with just one.
short on off, pulled down to fine leg. Dhoni does what Dhoni does. Onto you
a french cut to finish. A yorker on leg, skewed between his legs for a run to square leg. And India now become the No. 1 ODI team in the world and finish off this series as quickly as possible.
